# Amazon Ec2 R5 A Instance

```text
aws-20210131/Resource/Compute/AmazonEc2R5AInstance
```

```text
include('aws-20210131/Resource/Compute/AmazonEc2R5AInstance')
```

|icon|card|element|group|
|---|---|---|---|
|![](AmazonEc2R5AInstance.png)|![](AmazonEc2R5AInstance.card.png)|![](AmazonEc2R5AInstance.element.png)|![](AmazonEc2R5AInstance.group.png)|



## card
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap
include('aws-20210131/bootstrap')
' loads the AmazonEc2R5AInstance element
include('aws-20210131/Resource/Compute/AmazonEc2R5AInstance')
AmazonEc2R5AInstanceCard('amazon_ec_2_r_5_a_instance', 'Amazon Ec2 R5 A Instance', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```

```plantuml

' configures the library
```
